price: Au wanasema: Huyu ni mtunga mashairi, tunamtarajia kupatilizwa na dahari.
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ
footnotes: Bali ati wanasema huyu ni mtunga mashairi, tunaye mngojea afikiwe na mauti!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna shāʿirun natarabbaṣu bihi rayba al-manūni
